snippet: Bond mutual funds had a strong 2011. But deciding on a portfolio may well become a more delicate issue this year.
abstract: Deciding on a portfolio in 2012 is a delicate balancing act, despite strong markets for bond mutual funds in 2011, due to the past year's volatility around the world; lack of quick solutions to global financial problems make investing even less certain than it has been in the recent past.
lead_paragraph: Bond mutual funds had a strong 2011. But deciding on a portfolio may well become a more delicate issue this year.

headline.seo: For Bond Investors, a Year to Tread Carefully
headline.main: For Bond Investors, a Year to Tread Carefully
headline.print_headline: A Year To Tread Carefully in Bond Funds
